cpu: AMD Ryzen 5 2500U with Radeon Vega Mobile Gfx
notes: Game enters fullscreen mode and displays splash screen for a moment, then  flickers and disappears, capturing the mouse cursor in a small region and leaving the application visible in KDE's task bar. Alt+Tab releases the mouse capture, and SIGKILL ended the process with no lingering issues.
title: Heroes of Might & Magic V: Hammers of Fate
